scripts.build: babel ./models/create_chessboard.js --presets=env,react --plugins=transform-react-jsx > tmp.js && browserify ./tmp.js -t babelify  --outfile ./public/out.js && rm -f tmp.js; babel ./models/create_static_chessboard.js --presets=env,react --plugins=transform-react-jsx > static_tmp.js && browserify ./static_tmp.js -t babelify  --outfile ./public/static_out.js && rm -f static_tmp.js;
